briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Dexlansoprazole on Heartburn Relief in Chinese Patients
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Double-blind Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Dexlansoprazole (30 mg QD) Compared to Placebo on Heartburn Relief in Subjects With Symptomatic Nonerosive Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD)
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of dexlansoprazole compared to placebo in relief of daytime and nighttime heartburn over 4 weeks in Chinese participants with symptomatic non-erosive Gastroesophageal Reflux Disease (GERD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Days With Neither Daytime Nor Nighttime Heartburn During Treatment
